title: MONDAY 4/12 - Najee Harris ready for the NFL
itunes:title: MONDAY 4/12 - Najee Harris ready for the NFL
description:
Bills quarterback Josh Allen ready for an even bigger season in 2021. Hear about the advice he received from his offensive coordinator (0:09). Former Alabama running back Najee Harris (1:45) says his time with Nick Saban has prepared him for a career in the NFL. Plus Ravens linebacker Patrick Queen hoping to see one of his former teammates join him in Baltimore (2:11)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
